Authors:
Sergei Shalygin, Regina Rinatovna Shalygina, Vera Redrkina,
Cory Bates Gargas, Jeffrey Randolph Johansen
Title:
Description of Stenomitos edaphicum sp. nov.
(Leptolyngbyaceae, Cyanobacteria) with an emendation of the genus
Keywords:
Stenomitos edaphicum, Leptolyngbyaceae, Cyanobacteria, 16S
rRNA sequencing, Box-B, V3, Russia.
Abstract:
To spread more the light to the Russian cyanobacterial
research we collected, isolated and characterized simple filamentous
form from family Leptolyngbyaceae (Synechococcales). That taxon appears
to be new to science species of the recently described genus Stenomitos,
St. edaphicum. Morphological characterization of St. edaphicum presented
in the paper required emendation of the genus originally described from
Hawaii.
